DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study learn woman gain weight use progestin-only method contraception , much . The investigator look user two progestin-only method : levonorgestrel-containing intrauterine contraceptive ( LNG-IUC ) etonorgestrel ( ENG ) subdermal implant , compare user ' weight change user non-hormonal method , copper intrauterine device . The primary hypothesis ENG implant LNG-IUC user ' weight body composition increase copper-IUD user . The investigator collect body composition data use dual-energy x-ray absorptiometry ( DEXA ) , collect information diet activity use validated questionnaire .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Body Composition & Weight Change Users Progestin-only Contraception During First Year Use
